languages.text: "Ваше решение — закон. С подобным правом исказить правосудие и породить анархию в рядах слуг его — слишком просто. И, вероятно, заманчиво для еретика, ищущего радость в разрушении".
"Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."
languages.original_text: "Ваше решение — закон. С подобным правом исказить правосудие и породить анархию в рядах слуг его — слишком просто. И, вероятно, заманчиво для еретика, ищущего радость в разрушении".

traits.locale_text: "Your decision is law. With such a right to pervert justice and breed anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."
"Your decision is law. With such a right to pervert justice and breed anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."
"Your decision is law. With such a right to pervert justice and breed anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."
"Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."
"Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."

languages.text: "Eure Entscheidung ist Gesetz. Mit einem solchen Recht ist es allzu leicht, die Gerechtigkeit zu pervertieren und in den Reihen ihrer Diener Anarchie zu entfachen. Und vermutlich ist es für eine Ketzerin verlockend, die Spaß an der Zerstörung findet."
languages.original_text: "Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Entscheidung ist Gesetz. Mit einem solchen Recht ist es allzu leicht, die Gerechtigkeit zu pervertieren und in den Reihen ihrer Diener Anarchie zu entfachen. Und vermutlich ist es für eine Ketzerin verlockend, die Spaß an der Zerstörung findet."

languages.text: « Votre décision fait loi. Avec un tel pouvoir, pervertir la justice et encourager l'anarchie parmi ses serviteurs n'est que trop aisé. Et probablement tentant pour {mf|un hérétique|une hérétique} qui trouve son plaisir dans la destruction. »
languages.original_text: "Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."

traits.locale_text: « Votre décision fait loi. Avec un tel pouvoir, pervertir la justice et encourager l'anarchie parmi ses serviteurs n'est que trop aisé. Et probablement tentant pour {mf|un hérétique|une hérétique} qui trouve son plaisir dans la destruction. »

languages.text: “你的决定等同于法律。拥有如此强大的权力，显然可以轻而易举地歪曲正义，在仆从之中散播异端邪说。对于通过毁灭来寻求愉悦的异端分子而言，这或许相当诱人。”
languages.original_text: "Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."

traits.locale_text: “你的决定等同于法律。拥有如此强大的权力，显然可以轻而易举地歪曲正义，在仆从之中散播异端邪说。对于通过毁灭来寻求愉悦的异端分子而言，这或许相当诱人。”

languages.text: «Su decisión es la ley. Con ese derecho, pervertir la justicia y fomentar la anarquía entre sus sirvientes es un juego de niños... y algo muy tentador para un{mf||a} hereje que disfruta con la destrucción».
languages.original_text: "Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."

traits.locale_text: «Su decisión es la ley. Con ese derecho, pervertir la justicia y fomentar la anarquía entre sus sirvientes es un juego de niños... y algo muy tentador para un{mf||a} hereje que disfruta con la destrucción».

languages.text: 「あなたの決定が法なのです。そのような権利を持てば、正義を歪め、従者たちの間に無秩序を生み出すことはあまりにも簡単になります。そして、おそらく破壊に歓びを見出す異端者にとっては誘惑となるに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの決定が法なのです。そのような権利を持てば、正義を歪め、従者たちの間に無秩序を生み出すことはあまりにも簡単になります。そして、おそらく破壊に歓びを見出す異端者にとっては誘惑となるに違いありません」

languages.text: "Kararların kanun hükmündedir. Böyle büyük bir güçle adaleti saptırmak, adalete hizmet edenler arasına anarşi tohumları sokmak ziyadesiyle kolay... Hatta senin gibi yıkımdan haz duyan bir kâfir için cazip olsa gerek."
languages.original_text: "Your decision is law. With such a right, perverting justice and breeding anarchy in the ranks of its servants is all too easy. And probably tempting for a heretic who seeks joy in destruction."

traits.locale_text: "Kararların kanun hükmündedir. Böyle büyük bir güçle adaleti saptırmak, adalete hizmet edenler arasına anarşi tohumları sokmak ziyadesiyle kolay... Hatta senin gibi yıkımdan haz duyan bir kâfir için cazip olsa gerek."
